errors.addressNotFound: ES Could not retrieve the blockchain address for sending funds. Apologies for any inconvenience.
errors.emailValid: ES Must be a valid email address
errors.emailsDoNotMatch: ES Email addresses do not match
errors.invalidName: ES Invalid first and last name
errors.failedPayment: ES Invalid payment details. Check your credit card and/or billing address details.
errors.minimumBid: ES Your bid must be at least {{amount}}
errors.bidLessThanHighestBid: ES Your bid was lower than the current high bid.
errors.maxCharacters: ES Must be less than {max} characters
errors.minCharacters: ES Must be at least {min} characters
errors.minUSDC: ES Found balance of {{balance}} USD, but the minimum needed is {{min}} USD
errors.maxItems: ES Must pick at most {max} items
errors.minImageFileSize: ES Image must be {{fileSize}} or smaller
errors.noUSDC: ES No USDC found in wallet
errors.onlyLettersAndNumbers: ES Must contain only letters and numbers
errors.onlyLowercaseLettersAndNumbers: ES Only lowercase characters and numbers allowed
errors.paymentNotCreated: ES The payment could not be created. Please contact support.
errors.transferDeclined: ES Transaction was declined, or something went wrong during payment.
errors.transferNotFound: ES Transfer not found. If this was completed, keep checking the status.

bankInstructions.label: ES Bank Wire Instructions
bankInstructions.helpText: ES Below is all of the information you need to initiate a wire transfer. Keep in mind, your bank may use slightly different names for these details. May the odds be ever in your favor.
bankInstructions.notice: ES You're not done! Once you submit your payment info, we will share the information you need to bring to your bank to initiate a wire transfer. Once you complete payment below, you will have 7 days to submit payment before your winning bid is canceled.

bid.confirmation: ES I understand that I need to complete payment within 72 hours or I will forfeit my winning bid.
bid.description: ES Your card will be charged immediately on auction close if you place the winning bid.
bid.label: ES Your Bid
bid.success: ES You're the current high bidder for {{title}}

defaultCard.label: ES Default
defaultCard.helpText: ES Make card my default for purchases

fullName.label: ES Full Name
fullName.helpText: ES As it appears on your card

description.1: ES your PIN code is used to approve every transaction.
description.2: ES It cannot be recovered or reset.

passphrase.label: ES Passphrase
passphrase.warning: ES Write down your PIN number!
passphrase.enterPassphrase: ES Enter your PIN code to authorize this transaction.

card.label: ES Credit Card
card.helpText: ES Accepted for winning bids up to $3,000

wire.label: ES Bank Wire Transfer
wire.helpText: ES Accepted for all winning bids

crypto.label: ES Crypto Wallet
crypto.helpText: ES Accepted for all winning bids. Payment accepted in USDC from WalletConnect, MyAlgo, or Coinbase.

payWithCrypto.label: ES Pay with Crypto
payWithCrypto.helpText: ES We can only accept crypto payments in USDC-A.

tutorial.prompt: ES Don't have a Crypto Wallet yet?

instructions.label: ES If you already have a wallet
instructions.1: ES Click to connect and scan the QR code using your wallet's mobile app, OR copy the blockchain address to your clipboard.
instructions.2: ES Initiate the purchase, either by clicking the Purchase button or manually transferring funds to the copied address.
instructions.3: ES Submit your payment of {{price}} in USDC.
instructions.4: ES Check for payment. Once we receive your payment, you will be the new owner of the NFT.

createWallet.label: ES Create a Wallet
createWallet.link: ES Tutorial on creating a new account
createWallet.1: ES Install Algorand Wallet on your mobile device
createWallet.2: ES Create a new account with Algorand Wallet
createWallet.3: ES Add USDC by clicking Add new asset and searching for USDC

purchaseAlgos.label: ES Purchase ALGOs
purchaseAlgos.link: ES Tutorial on transferring cryptocurrency using Coinbase
purchaseAlgos.notice: ES Note: Fees are added during the swap
purchaseAlgos.1: ES Sign up for a Coinbase account
purchaseAlgos.3: ES Transfer ALGOs to your Algorand wallet

swapAlgos.label: ES Swap ALGOs for USDC-A
swapAlgos.notice: ES Beware of extra fees and slippage! Wallet needs to have enough to cover the item cost + fees.
swapAlgos.2: ES Select ALGOs as From and USDC as To

saveCard.label: ES Save my card for future purchases

username.helpText: ES How you'll appear to others
username.label: ES Username
